title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a Flask API for a simple blog with:
- GET /api/posts - List all posts
- GET /api/posts/<id> - Get specific post
- POST /api/posts - Create post (requires title and content)
- DELETE /api/posts/<id> - Delete post
Include validation and proper status codes.
instructions:

hints.text: Use @app.route decorator with methods parameter. Validate required fields. Return appropriate status codes (200, 201, 404, 400).
